Sentencas: Analyses of gas transport and hydrocarbon internal-reforming chemistry in nickel/yttria-stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cell applications are presented.
Titulo: Gas transport and internal-reforming chemistry in Ni-YSZ and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Ni-YSZ anode supports are fabricated using reaction-sintered powders (Ni-YRSZ) developed by CoorsTek, Inc. (Golden, CO, USA): the porous ferritic-steel supports are developed by PLANSEE SE (Reutte, Austria).
Titulo: Gas transport and internal-reforming chemistry in Ni-YSZ and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The gas-transport and methane internal-reforming properties of these supports are measured using a unique Separated Anode Experiment that decouples these processes from electrochemical processes that are normally present in an operational SOFC.
Titulo: Gas transport and internal-reforming chemistry in Ni-YSZ and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Experimental results are interpreted using a computational model.
Titulo: Gas transport and internal-reforming chemistry in Ni-YSZ and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Despite significant differences in thickness and morphology between the Ni-YRSZ and ferritic-steel supports, results show that the rate of gas transport across the ferritic-steel support is comparable to that of the Ni-YRSZ support.
Titulo: Gas transport and internal-reforming chemistry in Ni-YSZ and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: While the Ni-YRSZ supports show extensive methane internal-reforming activity, the ferritic-steel supports are essentially inert towards methane reforming.
Titulo: Gas transport and internal-reforming chemistry in Ni-YSZ and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This lack of internal-reforming activity in the metallic support motivates application of the computational model toward design of a Ni-YSZ anode-functional layer (AFL) to be placed atop the metallic support.
Titulo: Gas transport and internal-reforming chemistry in Ni-YSZ and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Anode functional layers are found to provide a moderate level of internal reforming, though significantly lower than the complete Ni-YRSZ anode support, with very little effect on gas transport.
Titulo: Gas transport and internal-reforming chemistry in Ni-YSZ and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The tools and methods presented here may be used for further design optimization of next-generation SOFC supports and architectures.
Titulo: Gas transport and internal-reforming chemistry in Ni-YSZ and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cells
Gas transport and internal-reforming chemistry in Ni-YSZ and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cells
Gas transport and internal-reforming chemistry in Ni-YSZ and ferritic-steel supports for solid-oxide fuel cells
